dict.acceptation: 操作，经营；手术；[数]运算；作用；

sent.orig: In this case, if necessary, turn tonometer ON, pressing the OPERATION button momentarily.
sent.trans: 这种情况下，如需开眼压仪，短按OPERATION按钮。

sent.orig: This paper studies the inverse operation of the matrix power operation, namely the root operation.
sent.trans: 摘要研究了矩阵幂运算的逆运算，即矩阵的开方运算。

sent.orig: Operation Panel: panel by the temperature control operation table, operation constitutes button.
sent.trans: 操作面板：操作面板由温度控制表、操作按钮构成。

sent.orig: This paper studies the operation of the matrix power operation, namely the root operation.
sent.trans: 研究了矩阵幂运算的逆运算，即矩阵的开方运算。

sent.orig: To monitor all related people to follow operation instructions, safety operation procedure and anti-mixing procedure.
sent.trans: 监管相关人员按照作业指导书，安全操作规程，防混料程序进行操作。
